name: City of Cash
description:
Build your company, become a billionaire! 

Hey! Are you tired of being an employee? Have you ever dreamed of quitting that boring job and building your own start-up company?
In City of Cash, it will be a dream come true!

Don’t be surprised when you make windfall profits with only one simple click! Remember, you are the boss with great business talents here. All the employees are at your disposal and your job is to invest in any project you want!  MAKE CITY PROPEROU What a potential location! It just needs a business minded entrepreneur to develop it. A successful commercial area needs a variety of shops,supermarket, spa, shopping mall... can you handle it? show your management talent!
 NEGTIATION & ACQUISITION
Lead your team to negotiate with the competitors. Each of your talents has his/her own specialty. Recruit and put them in the most suitable position, Negotiate! Acquire! Be the boss! 
BOSS STYLE  Forget your former cheap car! As a boss, you deserve better transport，and more! Limited edition cars, luxury villa, even overseas amusement parks! What you need is not something you afford, but something you want!
